input.sentences: today [female] and mick arrived for their honeymoon .
they had a romantic villa hotel room for their stay .
behind their hotel was some unique plants .
mick and [female] spent an entire day at the beach .
they stayed at the beach and watched the sunset on their first day of being married .
output.sentences: Mick decided to take his newly wed female on a fantastic honeymoon.
They stayed in a romantic villa on the sea side.
The place was better than any hotel I'd ever been to with beautiful scenery which included some unique plants.
The money Mick spent on the honeymoon was well worth it and any female would be so lucky.
The night they were to leave they missed their flight but it was okay because they were able to stay and watch one more glorious sunset.
